messages.subject: The character(mascot/manga/anime) of 108 kinds of KatsuyoriTakeda

messages.messageBody:
When the illustration of the mascot of the KatusyoriTakeda was invited,
108 kinds of illustrations were contributed.

We are going to commoditize the illustration and sell it in the event on October 10th.

I have mascots seen and recommendation and the opinion are invited.

Since how many pieces are sufficient, please send your recommendation and an opinion.

The mascot of the Takeda is chosen by your recommendation and vote.

http://katsuyoritosa.web.fc2.com/mascot.html




http://katsuyoritosa.web.fc2.com/characterinternationak.html
